patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with a credit card?
Payment failed, what should I do?
What if my payment doesn't go through?
responses: You can pay online using UPI, net banking, or major credit/debit cards. You can also pay in person at the restaurant.
We accept both online (UPI, cards) and offline (cash) payments. Please select your preferred method during checkout.
If your payment failed, please try again or use an alternative payment method. If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
Yes, you can pay with cash directly at the restaurant. For online payments, we support UPI, net banking, and cards.

patterns: How do I book a table?
I want to make a reservation
What are the steps to book a restaurant?
Can I get a table for two?
I'd like to book a dinner
How to eat in a restaurant
responses: To book a restaurant, go to the 'Restaurant' tab, search for a place, choose your time and date, and complete the booking form.
Choose your preferred cuisine, select a restaurant, click 'Book', fill in your details like date and time, and confirm your reservation.
The steps to book are simple: 1. Find a restaurant. 2. Select a time and date. 3. Fill in your details. 4. Complete the booking.

patterns: How do I cancel my booking?
I need to cancel my reservation
Can I get a refund for a cancelled booking?
How long does a refund take?
responses: You can cancel your booking from the 'Bookings' tab. Refunds are typically processed within 3-5 business days.
Go to the 'Bookings' tab, select the reservation you want to cancel, and follow the steps. For a full refund, you must cancel at least 5 hours before your reservation time.
Our refund policy is as follows: cancellations made more than 5 hours in advance get a full refund. Less than 5 hours will result in a partial refund.

patterns: Can I order food to my house?
responses: As a restaurant booking platform, we don't handle food delivery directly. We focus on in-person reservations. For delivery, please use platforms like Swiggy or Zomato.

patterns: Can you show me the location on a map?
How do I get to [Restaurant Name]?
responses: You can find the restaurant's address on its profile page. We also provide a map for easy navigation.
The full address and directions are available on the restaurant's details page after you select it.
Please select a restaurant, and its location details will be displayed.

patterns: Is the restaurant open on weekends?
responses: The opening hours are listed on each restaurant's profile page. They vary by location and day of the week.
You can view the operating hours by clicking on the restaurant's name and looking at its details.
Please check the specific restaurant's page for its most up-to-date operating hours.

patterns: What kind of food do you serve?
responses: Yes, the menu for each restaurant is available on its details page. You can browse it before you book.
Most restaurants have their full menu listed on their profile. You can see it there along with prices.
You can view the menu by clicking on the restaurant you're interested in. We have a wide range of options, including vegetarian and vegan dishes.
